name: Is this image AI-generated?
explanation: Yes! An AI used Learning to create this image. Look for strange things in the background - AI sometimes makes mistakes because it learned patterns, not real understanding!

name: Is this image AI-generated?
explanation: This is a real photo taken with a camera! A person used Perception (their eyes) to frame the shot. No Learning algorithm made this one.

name: Is this image AI-generated?
explanation: This was made by AI using Learning! Look at the fingers, faces, or background details - AI learned from pictures but sometimes gets human features wrong.

name: Is this image AI-generated?
explanation: Yes, AI made this! The strange human features show that while AI has powerful Learning, it doesn't truly understand what people look like. This is about Societal Impact too - AI images can trick us!

name: Is this image AI-generated?
explanation: This is a real photo! It was captured by a camera, not created by AI Learning. Real photos come from the real world, not from patterns an AI learned.
